Zenyak was near the Ark being slagged by the autoguns, Iron Raptor.

::Zenyak/Prowl/Striker::

Zenyak stumbles back from an autogun blast when the ground under him starts 
to shake. He grins. The earthquake should interfere with the autogun's aiming 
systems, allowing him to escape.

He turns around to see the damage he had done, and instead sees a giant 
creature stampeding at him.

"Holy SLAG!!!" he yells, spinning around to try and run, the shaking ground 
making it dificult. He runs away from the creature, firing blindly behind him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Striker and Prowl jump out of the exit of the Ark, Striker instantly aiming 
his gun at Zenyak. His eyes narrow as he carefully takes aim, trying not to 
his Iron Raptor.

Striker's eyes widen as Prowl's hand covers the end of his rifle right before 
he shoots.

"What are you doing?!" Striker yells as pieces of Prowl's land in an area 
several feet in front of them.

"You could have hit her," Prowl says trough clenched teeth, one hand holding 
the stump left of the other.

Striker growls. "I should have taken Sniper along. How did Zenyak even get 
here in the first place?"

"Me and Iron Raptor picked him up a while back," Prowl answers, taking his 
gun in his good hand and heading out toward Zenyak and Iron Raptor.

Striker's hand on his shoulder stops him. "You could have hit her," Striker 
says, mimicing Prowl's worried tone, "She can take care of it, Prowl. Right 
now I want to know how Zenyak ended up in front of the Ark instead of in a 
holding cell."

Prowl blushes. "I was ... distracted," he says, looking at Striker to see his 
reaction.

Striker's eyes widen. "You are the last person I'd expect to do that. Ok, go 
get that hand healed," Striker says in a disapointed tone.

Prowl shakes his head. "I'm fine. I can get repaired later," he says and sets 
off once again toward Iron Raptor, but stops when he feels Striker's rifle 
press against the back of his head.

"Go to a CR chamber, or I'll end up having to drag you to one," Striker says 
through clenched teeth in a very mad voice.

Prowl's shoulders slump in defeat. "All right, I'm going," he says, setting 
off towards the CR chamber.

Striker nods. "Good." He says and runs off toward Iron Raptor. If she didn't 
devour Zenyak by the time he got there, maybe he could salvage some of the 
predacon for questioning.
